  • Uses of OSFileStore in oshi.software.os

    Methods in oshi.software.os that return types with arguments of type OSFileStore
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<OSFileStore>
    FileSystem.getFileStores()
    Get file stores on this machine Instantiates a list of OSFileStore objects, representing a storage pool, device, partition, volume, concrete file system or other implementation specific means of file storage.
    List<OSFileStore>
    FileSystem.getFileStores(boolean localOnly)
    Get file stores on this machine Instantiates a list of OSFileStore objects, representing a storage pool, device, partition, volume, concrete file system or other implementation specific means of file storage.
